title: Kate Hudson reasons her split with ex Matthew Bellamy
text:
Kate Hudson reasons her split with ex Matthew Bellamy 
Entertainment Industry News.Net (ANI) : Friday 16th October, 2015 
Kate Hudson was mum on her 2014 breakup, but now she has finally opened up on her separation with her fiance Matthew Bellamy. 
Claiming that the relationship endings are painful, the 36-year-old actress said in a recent interview that she and Bellamy would have been together if they had a great relation, but they chose to move on because they had different visions of how they wanted their lives to be, reports E! Online. 
The 'Almost Famous' star added that she can still rebuild something with her former partner if it would be for her kids' betterment. 
Hudson also revealed that she has been in touch with Bellamy since their separation and they meet quite often. (ANI) More Entertainment Industry News
